alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 21 at 7:54PM EDT until July 21 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and western Massachusetts, including the following counties, in central Massachusetts, Worcester. In western Massachusetts, Franklin. * WHEN...Until 945 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 754 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2.5 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orange, Deerfield, Athol, Montague, Sunderland, Northfield, Bernardston, Leverett, Erving, Shutesbury, Gill, Royalston, New Salem, Wendell and Warwick. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
